assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare no conflicts of interest. JLV, MLC, AAA, TY, and CAB are employees of the U.S. Department of Veterans Affairs (VA). The views expressed in this manuscript do not represent those of the U.S. government or VA.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The study was approved by the Harvard Longwood Campus Institutional Review Board (Protocol #20-2098). All participants consented to participation in the research.
